link_desc:
Based on / inspired by Rick van Vliet's Nimble Storage Template.

Only tested on version 2.3.15.0-352557-opt of the Nimble software.

Features:

16 regular items and 3 graphs.

50 item prototypes, 7 trigger prototypes and 6 graph prototypes.

Links Zabbix build-in ICMP template.

Highlighted Changes:

Does correct space calculations.

Added pr. volume latency data, including percentage of IOps above 20 and 50ms, with accompanying triggers.

Graph Examples:

Colorgraded stacked read and write latency graphs pr. volume.

Percentage of read and write IOps latencies above 20 and 50ms (write is barely visible, green and yellow lines).

Pr. volume read and write IOps graph, including sequential performance data (purple and yellow lines).

Pr. volume read and write throughput graph, including sequential performance data (purple and yellow lines).

Only uses a single Value Map:

NimbleVolumeState

1 - True

2 - False
